title: Grotesk Alternate
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072018im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-03-20%20at%204_5658.29.31%20PM.png)

To be found here. The "t" "s" and "4" are particularly stunning.  
 [http://t-wo.it/2013/09/07/mattia-balsamini-folder-1/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072018/http:/t-wo.it/2013/09/07/mattia-balsamini-folder-1/ "http://t-wo.it/2013/09/07/mattia-balsamini-folder-1/")

Thank you so much!  
L

author: lyzlinda

comments.content:
That's their own font called Grotesk Alternate but [not showcases](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072018/http:/t-wo.it/category/typography). It somehow mixes influences from [Mercator](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072018/http:/typophile.com/node/53257) and [Akzidenz Grotesk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072018/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/Akzidenz+Grotesk). Alternatives: [Circular LL](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072018/http:/lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Text+Fonts/Circular), [Maison Neue MG](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072018/http:/www.milieugrotesque.com/typeface-maisonneue)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072018im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-1_3799.png)
